p: WHO has unveiled its Arc Geographic Information SystemÂ (ArcGIS) Operations dashboard for COVID-19 on Jan 26, 2020, which maps and lists the number of cases and deaths [ 19]. It shows an epidemic curve that represents the number of cases by date of reporting. It also has a section that provides links to additional authentic information regarding COVID-19. The main goal is to map the worldwide spread of misinformation and confusion.
